name: Polyscape
description:
Polyscape is a minimalist city builder strategy game with randomly generated polygonal maps.

Progress through 5 levels unlocking 8 buildings and (2 secrets :o) as you create beautiful cities from simple rules.

Work with each buildings wants and needs in a limited space.

  • The lumber mill wants to be left alone, not adjacent to any other buildings.
  • While the farm wants to be large and adjacent to houses.

Can you combo your buildings individual bonuses together to create the most efficient city possible?
